author: Cortex XSIAM

commands.description: Converts an image file to a PDF file.
commands.name: rasterize-image

commands.description: Converts an HTML file to an image file or a PDF file.
commands.name: rasterize-html

commands.description: Converts a PDF file to an image file.
commands.name: rasterize-pdf

commands.description: Converts the contents of a URL to an image file or a PDF file.
commands.name: rasterize

commands.description: Converts the body of an email to an image file or a PDF file.

integration.description: Converts URLs, PDF files, and emails to an image file or PDF file.
integration.name: Rasterize

description: Converts URLs, PDF files, and emails to an image file or PDF file.
name: Rasterize
readme:
During incident investigation you can enhance the investigation with screenshots of URLS or with emails and other PDF files.  
**Note:**  
This content pack is installed by default when Cortex is initially deployed.  

## What Does This Pack Do?  
Converts URLs, PDF files, and emails to an image file or a PDF file.
